bibl.title: New Papyri from the New York University Collection: IV
P.NYU 2.4
bibl.note: Suite de: ZPE 140 (2002) pp. 129-150, 7 figg. et pll. V-X. - 38. Inv. 524 (XX, 1). Homer, Iliad Γ, 188-189. Prov. unknown, Ia-Ip. - 39. Inv. 4 (II, 15). Roman Will. Fayum (Karanis?), 335p. - 40. Inv. 37 (XIVc, 50). Official Document. Prob. Oxyrhynchite nome, IVp. - 41. Inv. 17 (III, 60). Tax Receipt. Oxyrhynchus, 2.v.131 - 22.v.132p. - 42. Inv. 41 (II, 219). Tax Receipt. Hermopolite nome?, VII/VIIIp. - 43. Inv. 68 (XVIII, 21). Tax (?) Receipt. Aphroditopolite nome, 24.vii.221p. - 44. Inv. 77 (X, 20). Tax Receipt. Prov. unknown, iv-v.55p. - 45. Inv. 8 (II, 89). New Edition of S.B. IV, 7285. Hypomnema for the Nomarch Nikanor. Fayum?, 24.vi.212a? (or 30.vi.237a / 20.vi.195a?). - 46. Inv. 20 (IV, 1). Report Concerning Work Performed. Prov. unknown, III/IVp. - 47. Inv. 21 (IX, 10). Order for Delivery. Prov. unknown, V/VIp. - 48. Inv. 454. Transportation Receipt. Prov. unknown, late IVp. - 49. Inv. 367 (IX, 8). Order to Arrest. Oxyrhynchite nome?, II/IIIp? - 50. Inv. 9 recto (II, 108 recto). Account. Hermopolite nome, III/IVp. - 51. Inv. 9 verso (II, 108 verso). Account. Hermopolite nome, III/IVp. - 52. Inv. 31 recto (XIVb, 63). Private Account. Prov. unknown, early IIp. - 53. Inv. 31 verso (XIVb, 63). Private Account. Oxyrhynchite?, early IIp. - [P. N.Y.U. II, 38-53.]
bibl.seg: NIELSEN Bruce E. and Klaas A. WORP, New Papyri from the New York University Collection: IV.
